reviews.review_content:
This professor is one of the nicest and most informative I've had at Barnard.  She is willing to help and is always trying to understand her students.  She is a fair grader and while the syllabus may seem daunting at first, it's definately do-able.  I suggest taking any class she teaches.
Workload:
Very managable.  Three papers and short quiz, but lots of reading which you can kind of skip around with as long as you get the main point of the readings.
